mapper.select: SELECT ID AS id, NAME AS name, PASSWORD AS password, LOCKED AS locked FROM T_USER WHERE NAME=#{username};
SELECT ID AS id, NAME AS name, PASSWORD AS password, LOCKED AS locked FROM T_USER WHERE ID=#{userId};
SELECT U.ID AS userId, U.`NAME` AS username, I.AVATAR_URL AS avatarUrl FROM T_USER AS U,T_USER_INFO AS I WHERE U.ID=I.USER_ID AND U.`NAME` LIKE #{username};
SELECT U.ID AS userId, U.`NAME` AS username, I.AVATAR_URL AS avatarUrl FROM T_USER AS U,T_USER_INFO AS I WHERE U.ID=I.USER_ID LIMIT #{begin},#{length};
